bach.DataFrame.expanding¶

DataFrame.expanding(min_periods=1, center=False, on=None)[source]¶

Create an expanding window starting with the first row in the group, with at least min_period observations. The result will be right-aligned in the window

Param

min_periods: The minimum amount of observations in the window before a value is reported

Param

center: Whether to center the result, currently not supported

Param

on: The partition that will be applied. Note: this is different from pandas, where The partition is determined earlier in the process.
